name: Animal Herd Royale
description:
Animal Herd Royale is a dynamic 1vs1 online game where player race in animal herding competition. Loot special baits and try not to scare the pet.

The game was made during gamejam in 2022 organized by https://www.elympics.cc

Github:

https://github.com/Elympics/elympics-jam-november-2022-cheesy-soupy
